DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect Ketoconazole pharmacokinetic characteristic CKD-501 healthy subject .
DOC.detailed_description: From day 1 day 5 , Ketoconazole 200mg administer twice daily Group 1 patient period 1 . Then day 5 , CKD-501 0.5mg co-administered Group 1 patient period 1 . After 28 day-break , period 2 CKD-501 0.5mg administer day 5 . Period 2 Ketoconazole administer . Group 2 administer reverse order .
